name: Merge Fish - Idle Tycoon Game
description:
Click, Tap and Drag to Merge Fish. Upgrade Fish to Earn More Coins and Unlock New Fishes! Build your own fish island! Be a Merger Master! Be an Idle Fishing Tycoon! Be a Fish Expert!

Love fishes or a fish hobbyist already?
Do you want to learn more fishes?
Are you dreaming of being a Fishing Tycoon?

Don’t wait! Download the Merge Fish now!
Start merging fish, become a Merger Master now!
Will you be the next Idle Tycoon of fish merging!

Features:
* Tap and drag to merge fishes, Merge Fishes will unlock new fish
* Buy, Merge, and Manage your fishes to make them earn coins for you
* Get Idle Money, Even when you are OFFLINE!
* More than 30 different kinds of AMAZING fishes!
* Various boosts to increase your profits!
* EASY to play: Click, Tap, Drag, Merge and Earn coins!
* Addictive and Stunning graphics
* No WIFI needed!

Tips and Skills:
* Keep merging fishes to unlock new fishes
* New fish earns more coins
* Don’t miss any chance to get free fishes
* Use the boosts to increase your profits
* Buy more fishes, merge more fishes, and product more coins!

Like Merge Fish - Tap Click Idle Tycoon on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/MergeFishTycoon/

Have any questions or suggestions? Please feel free to contact us:
dragonplusgames@gmail.com

With so much fun, Download Merge Fish right now! Become the BEST Fish Merger Tycoon Ever!

Notes:
* Merge Fish supports various mobile devices
* Merge Fish contains banner, interstitial, reward video ads
* Merge Fish is free to play. But you can purchase virtual coins by IAP

Don’t forget to let us know if you can recognize ALL the fishes in Merge Fish.
